document_data.name: Wraith Eidolon
document_data.mainbody: The '''wraith eidolon'''<ref group="note">The lore entries for this creature mistakenly refer to it as a "wrath eidolon". was a unique [[eidolon]] created by the [[arcanist]]s of [[Netheril]] to protect the outpost of [[Xin'kar]].
document_data.Description: It was constructed by means of [[shadow magic]] and "dark emotions".
document_data.History:
The wraith eidolon was created some time after Xin'kar was founded, following the [[Fall of Netheril]] in the {{YearlinkName|-339}}. It served as a protector for the Netherese scholars for some time until the [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]]s of the [[Gray Wolf tribe]] overran Xin'kar. During the invasion, the last remaining resident of Xin'kar attempted to activate the wraith eidolon, but could not reach it in time.

It remained in a state of dormancy for centuries until the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. A group of bandits broke into Xin'kar looking for ancient relics and inadvertently activated the wraith eidolon.

Some time later, the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] delved into Xin'kar in order to recover ancient Uthgardt relic for the [[Forsworn]]. The hero dismantled the wraith eidolon once and for all.
